room11.description: The smithee looks long abandoned, with the coals buried in cold ash. You find a grindstone in the corner and a sword lying against a broken anvil.

actions.take sword: The rusty sword slips easily into your pocket in its entirety.  'It sure is weird that I can carry so much crap,' you think to yourself.
actions.use grindstone: Even sans an extensive knowledge of the art of smithing, you feel satisfied at the edge you have coaxed out of the pitted axe blade.
